name: transmission-daemon-cygwin
short_description:
October 31, 2014

Transmission is a respected "Fast, Easy, and Free BitTorrent Client", quoted from their site http://www.transmissionbt.com

Unofficial Windows build runs perfect either Windows service or daemon.

32 bit and 64 bit versions.
32 (runs everywhere), 64 only 64-bit versions of Windows.

Decision was made to maintain and compile the choice 2.7x core rather than somewhat buggy 2.8x core. That's why you will see infrequent and less bug fixes than official 2.8x branch. All the features of 2.8x (except rename). Run this solid 2.77+ port for extended days, it doesn't crash or lock. Prime for seedbox use.

The included remote GUI port is fine tuned to the daemon released here.

Temporary piece support. https://trac.transmissionbt.com/ticket/532 plus many featured enhancements! Tested, stable enhancements users requested.

Specifically modified and bug tested for building with cygwin gcc/g++ compiler.

Source: https://github.com/cfpp2p/transmission/commits/cygwin
summary: Windows executables  of up to date Transmission BitTorrent daemon
